selection_reasoning: Selected the top three performers which all broke the 2.59 barrier, and one diverse structural approach to ensure the evolution doesn't converge too quickly on a single grid type.

trial_selections.reasoning: Achieved the new highest score of 2.6104. This trial successfully improved upon the previous generation's best by using a near-grid formation and effective optimization.
Second highest score (2.5982). It shows a meaningful improvement over the trial_0_10 baseline, suggesting it found a better local basin.
Third highest score (2.5937). It provides another high-quality configuration that differs from the top two, maintaining some genetic diversity for the next generation.
While the score is lower (2.5388), it explores a corner-heavy heuristic. With refinement of the interior circles, this structural approach might yield different results than the grid-heavy models.
